## Example!

Load some packages

```{r, message=FALSE}
library(xs)
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)
```

Make us a treaty

```{r}
treaty <- quota_share(ceded = 0.6, ceding_commission = 0.1)
```

how about some policies

```{r}
policies <- data.frame(
  policy_id = 1:100,
  premium = rnorm(100, mean = 3000, sd = 1000)
)
head(policies)
```

Analyze premiums

```{r}
treaty %>% 
  treaty_apply_premiums(policies)
```

make some claims

```{r}
claims <- data.frame(
  claim_id = 1:50,
  loss = rgamma(50, 10, 0.001)
)

DT::datatable(claims)
```

Analyze them claims!

```{r}
treaty %>% 
  treaty_apply_claims(claims)
```
